Text.val: 17.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and added PI.ADMNO as mandatory parameter
06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) FROM :1/CMON WHERE CMON_YEAR = :2 and CMON_MONTH = :3 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':4' and CMON_CURRBALDEBTORS <> 0

select count(*) FROM :1/CMON CMON, :1/CLNT CLNT WHERE CMON.CMON_ADMNO = CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON.CMON_CLNTNO = CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO and CMON.CMON_YEAR = :2 and CMON.CMON_MONTH = :3 and CMON.CMON_CURRENCY = ':4' and CMON.CMON_ADMNO < 10 and CMON.CMON_CLNTNO <> 99999 and (CMON.CMON_TOTNPAYMAN+CMON.CMON_TOTNPAYAUTO) > 0 and CLNT.CLNT212_CONFIDENTIAL = 'N'

SELECT CMON.CMON_ADMNO, CMON.CMON_CLNTNO, CLNT.CLNT110_NAME1, CLNT.CLNT212_CONFIDENTIAL, CLNT.CLNT205_EMP_CONTACT, CMON.CMON_YEAR, CMON.CMON_MONTH, CMON.CMON_CURRBALDEBTORS from :1/CMON CMON, :1/CLNT CLNT where CMON.CMON_ADMNO = CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON.CMON_CLNTNO = CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO and CMON.CMON_YEAR = :2 and CMON.CMON_MONTH = :3 and CMON.CMON_CURRENCY = ':4' and CMON.CMON_CURRBALDEBTORS <> 0 order by CMON.CMON_ADMNO, CMON.CMON_CLNTNO for fetch only

SELECT CMON.CMON_ADMNO, CMON.CMON_CLNTNO, CLNT.CLNT114_COUNTRY, CMON.CMON_YEAR, CMON.CMON_MONTH, CMON.CMON_TOTNPAYMAN, CMON.CMON_TOTNPAYAUTO from :1/CMON CMON, :1/CLNT CLNT where CMON.CMON_ADMNO = CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON.CMON_CLNTNO = CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO and CMON.CMON_YEAR = :2 and CMON.CMON_MONTH = :3 and CMON.CMON_CURRENCY = ':4' and CMON.CMON_ADMNO < 10 and CMON.CMON_CLNTNO <> 99999 and (CMON.CMON_TOTNPAYMAN+CMON.CMON_TOTNPAYAUTO) > 0 and CLNT.CLNT212_CONFIDENTIAL = 'N' order by CMON.CMON_ADMNO, CMON.CMON_CLNTNO for fetch only
